mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(seq, id, pw, name, nickname, role, tel, addr, birth, email, tier) VALUES (member_seq.NEXTVAL,#{id},#{pw},#{name},#{nickname},USER,#{tel},#{addr},#{birth},#{email},5)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE id = #{id} AND pw = #{pw}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw}, name=#{name}, nickname=#{nickname}, tel=#{tel}, addr=#{addr}, birth=#{birth}, email=#{email} where email=#{email}
